body:
Hello,

I am able to generate a spack env with my own spack.yaml but I want to generate a module file which load this env.
I see how to generate a module file for each product of my env but not one module for all this env.

My goal is to load this env without "spack env" cmd.

Another approach could be to generate a view but I do not know how to specify "hardlink" in spack.yaml (symlink by default).
title: Spack environment module file or view hardlink
